name: Wander Root
description: Wander Root is a small game aiming at making you experience the reality of a root. Deep underground, you're digging, trying to gather ressources for your tree. You'll have the control over few roots, one at the time, each new root benificing of the power ups collected by the old ones.  In the soil, you'll find water, giving you the possibility to extand your root farther away, minerals, that will make you dig faster and mushrooms, that will, thanks to the mycellium, allow you to see further. The game is played with a mouse and was developped on Unity.
